MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the EH8 postcode area of Edinburgh affecting properties in Portobello Road and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and identified an immediate safety concern on our underground cable network. We now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3.30pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.43PM on the 6th February 2021.
